abstract: Flexibility wins Jerome Stakes horse race at Aqueduct Racetrack.

headline.print_headline: Flexibility Earns Derby Points With Win
headline.main: Flexibility Earns Derby Points With Win

snippet: Flexibility dominated the $200,000 Jerome Stakes at Aqueduct, the start of the New York road for 3-year-olds heading to the Triple Crown races.
lead_paragraph: Flexibility dominated the $200,000 Jerome Stakes at Aqueduct, the start of the New York road for 3-year-olds heading to the Triple Crown races.
